description: This burger recipe combines succulent slow-cooked pork with crunchy coleslaw, creamy aioli and tangy pickles. Serve with chips for a tasty family dinner.
name: Shredded Pork Knuckle & Slaw Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg Woolworths COOK slow cooked pork knuckle

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer pork to a board. Remove crackling and thinly slice. Using 2 forks, roughly shred pork, discarding bones and excess fat. Top bun bases with most of the slaw and pork, crackling and pickles. Sandwich with bun tops. Serve with chips, remaining slaw and pork.
